message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $150. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $175. This is a great compromise, considering its value to me is at least $150. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $175 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $155 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $165 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $160 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
